name: It's A Bao Time
description:
In "It's A Bao Time" you play as the mischievous but delightful bunny Tuzi, collecting bao buns for ability and strength points in order to rescue your friends. Unable to return back to the spirit world, they need Tuzi's help to overcome numerous obstacles both big and small. Explore this fantasy world and save the spirit world!

*THIS IS A DEMO VERSION 1.0*
Current bugs as of upload date (3/20):
*I recommend playing the game in full screen mode for best UI, UX, and overall gameplay experience.
*Formatting of UI Text in intro cut scene is out of place.
*Respawning not working in demo. If you fall off the tiled platform (ground) you will have to restart the game.
*You are currently unable to skip the intro scene. Please click "Load Previous Save" in order to go straight to the game level and skip intro. 
*Point system not working properly on completion of collecting all (4) baos in level.
